subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With a home run, two walks and a single, Curtis Granderson helped the Mets bounce back from a two-hit shutout loss, even as Daisuke Matsuzaka had to leave after an inning.
snippet: With a home run, two walks and a single, Curtis Granderson helped the Mets bounce back from a two-hit shutout loss, even as Daisuke Matsuzaka had to leave after an inning.
